content:
the Michigan Daily

One hundred and thirtythree years of editorial freedom

The crowd is pretty sparse here as the Wolverines start their first game of their doubleheader with Ball State PERIOD  But today is surprisingly perfect for a baseball game PERIOD  The sun is out the sky is clear and its a comfortable  degrees PERIOD  Its so nice that the windows in the press box are open so Im feeling the fresh spring Ann Arbor breeze PERIOD  Unfortunately I put my line up card next to my computer and it promptly flew out the window PERIOD  But it landed about eight rows up from the pressbox in front of a nice old man PERIOD  Its like Christmas here at The Fish PERIOD  Senior Mike Wilson is getting the start on the mound for Michigan and the rest of the starting line up looks like this

2B Nick Urban

SS Anthony Toth

CF Ryan LaMarre

1B Mike Dufek

DH Jake McLouth

RF Kenny Fellows

C Chris Berset

LF Garrett Stephens

3B Tim Kalczynski

For the rest of this entry click here PERIOD

title: Live Blog: Baseball vs. Ball State (Game 1)
